item.title: Getting Mortgage Ready | Understanding Money with Eoin McGee
item.description: Podcast Description Are you planning on applying for a mortgage? Eoin talks through the rules, tips, and tricks to help you get mortgage ready.  Eoin is joined by the newly appointed Mortgage Manager at Prosperous Financial, Antoinette McGrath, who’ll discuss how to make yourself more attractive to the banks to get an exemption. Listen today to learn how to navigate the mortgage maze. Got a question for Eoin? Send him a voicenote:

item.title: How To Pass On Your Wealth | Understanding Money with Eoin McGee
item.description: Podcast Description This week’s episode is all about Inheritance Tax or Capital Acquisition Tax.  What rules govern how much tax you pay when you inherit assets from your parents? How can you maximise the amount you inherit? In this week’s episode, Eoin is joined by Tax Advisor Donal Bradley and discusses what you should be doing now to help your kids pay as little tax when it comes to what they’ll inherit from you.

item.description: Podcast Description Usually we talk about what to do with our money, but this episode is all all about why we do stuff with our money. Got a question for Eoin? item.title: Getting Your Money To Work Harder | Understanding Money with Eoin McGee
item.description: Podcast Description Does your money work as hard as you do? This episode is all about why, when and where we invest. Eoin is joined by Marie who is ready to invest but doesn't know how to, and as always he answers your financial questions. Got a question for Eoin? item.title: The Home Stretch | Understanding Money with Eoin McGee
item.description: Podcast Description Trying to navigate buying a home or moving house in Ireland today. Eoin is joined by Lorcan Sirr, housing policy analyst and senior lecturer at TUD, to discuss the current state of play. Got a question for Eoin? Send him a voicenote: +353 87 291 0507 Get in touch on his socials: https://twitter.com/EoinMcGee https://www.instagram.com/eoin_mcgee/ Watch on YouTube: Lorcan Sirr: https://youtu.be/Nnk2DrwI3LM Audience Q&A: https://youtu.be/BYRUEtX_Mqs New episodes every Wednesday. item.title: Couples & Cash | Understanding Money with Eoin McGee
item.description: Podcast Description Couples & cash. Do you live in financial harmony or hell? Either way, this episode is for both of you! Conor and his partner grew up together romantically and financially and they've learnt a lot of lessons along the way. Some of these lessons are going to be for you and others are gonna turn you off completely. Got a question for Eoin? Send him a voicenote: +353 87 291 0507

item.title: Inflation | Understanding Money with Eoin McGee
item.description: Podcast Description This episode is all about inflation, how did we get here and where are we going? Muireann Lynch, Senior Research Officer with the ESRI explains how global energy prices have impacted inflation and what is likely to happen next. Eoin answers your financial questions and gives tips on how to reduce the cost of everyday living. Got a question for Eoin? Get in touch on his socials: https://twitter.com/EoinMcGee

item.title: Ireland's Financial Landscape | Understanding Money with Eoin McGee
item.description: Podcast Description Renowned financial planner Eoin McGee embarks on a journey of financial discovery to understand how current global events impact your money and lays out the building blocks of sound financial planning and how understanding them will leave you better placed. Economist Jim Power and Eoin discuss everything from inflation and Interest rates to house prices and the economic outlook for Ireland. Eoin answers your financial queries and 45 year old Neil Doyle reveals why living at home with his parents isn't all that bad!
